TextView.android:text:
Workout Mentor is an automated workout planning application which uses near field communication sensors input to automatically detect your workout regime.
You can check the history of your workout saved on each day on the calender and plan ahead your future workout.
Following contains functionality of the application: 
 - Tag Entry: User can check the history of the exercises performed. This section will gather the exercises performed by the user which can be edited and saved for each day. - Manual Entry: User can manually enter the exercises performed with this button. - Calender: User can check the history of thier workout on corresponding date of the month - Exercises: User can check the types of exercises in the application database - Stop Watch/ Alarm: User can set the timer with this section
